remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的表示单个操作通常返回一个值，以异步方式执行。The class represents a single operation that returns a value and that usually executes asynchronously. 对象是一种的中心思想[基于任务的异步模式](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/task-based-asynchronous-pattern-tap.md)首次引入.NET Framework 4 中。 objects are one of the central components of the [task-based asynchronous pattern](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/task-based-asynchronous-pattern-tap.md) first introduced in the .NET Framework 4. 因为由执行工作对象通常以异步方式执行线程池线程上而不是以同步方式在主应用程序线程中，可以使用属性，并将， ，和属性，以确定任务的状态。Because the work performed by a object typically executes asynchronously on a thread pool thread rather than synchronously on the main application thread, you can use the property, as well as the , , and properties, to determine the state of a task. 大多数情况下，lambda 表达式用于指定该任务所执行的工作量。Most commonly, a lambda expression is used to specify the work that the task is to perform. 可能在不同的方式中创建实例。 instances may be created in a variety of ways. 最常用的方法，从开始提供[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，是调用静态或方法。The most common approach, which is available starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], is to call the static or method. 这些方法提供了通过使用默认值，而无需获取其他参数启动任务的简单方法。These methods provide a simple way to start a task by using default values and without acquiring additional parameters. 下面的示例使用方法以启动循环，然后显示循环迭代数的任务：The following example uses the method to start a task that loops and then displays the number of loop iterations: [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1/cs/run1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1/vb/run1.vb#6)] 替代方法，并启动任务的最常见方式[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，是调用静态或方法。An alternative, and the most common way to start a task in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], is to call the static or method. 属性返回对象，并属性返回对象。The property returns a object, and the property returns a object. 重载其`StartNew`方法允许你将自变量传递，定义任务创建选项，并指定任务计划程序。Overloads of their `StartNew` method let you pass arguments, define task creation options, and specify a task scheduler. 下面的示例使用方法来启动任务。The following example uses the method to start a task. 它是功能上等效于上一示例中的代码。It is functionally equivalent to the code in the previous example. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1/cs/startnew1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1/vb/startnew1.vb#7)] 有关更完整示例，请参阅[基于任务的异步编程](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/task-based-asynchronous-programming.md)。For more complete examples, see [Task-based Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/task-based-asynchronous-programming.md). 类还提供了构造函数对任务进行初始化，但的未计划的执行。The class also provides constructors that initialize the task but that do not schedule it for execution. 出于性能原因和`Task.Factory.StartNew`方法是首选的机制，用于创建和计划计算任务，但对于任务创建和计划必须分开的情况下，可能会使用构造函数，并任务的方法然后可用于计划将在更高版本时执行的任务。For performance reasons, the and `Task.Factory.StartNew` methods are the preferred mechanisms for creating and scheduling computational tasks, but for scenarios where task creation and scheduling must be separated, the constructors may be used, and the task's method may then be used to schedule the task for execution at a later time. 自定位的桌面应用程序[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，创建并调用任务的线程的区域性将成为在线程的上下文的一部分。Starting with desktop apps that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], the culture of the thread that creates and invokes a task becomes part of the thread's context. 也就是说，无论执行该任务时的当前区域性，该任务的当前区域性是线程的调用线程的区域性。That is, regardless of the current culture of the thread on which the task executes, the current culture of the task is the culture of the calling thread. 对于面向版本之前的.NET Framework 的应用， [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，任务的区域性是执行该任务时的线程的区域性。For apps that target versions of the .NET Framework prior to the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], the culture of the task is the culture of the thread on which the task executes. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"区域性和基于任务的异步操作"部分主题。For more information, see the "Culture and task-based asynchronous operations" section in the topic. 请注意应用商店应用程序遵循中设置和获取默认区域性的 Windows 运行时。Note that Store apps follow the Windows Runtime in setting and getting the default culture. 对于不返回值的操作，您使用类。For operations that do not return a value, you use the class. 从C#7.0 中，是值类型，而不是引用类型，为更轻量任务使用结构。Starting with C# 7.0, for a more lightweight task that is a value type rather than a reference type, use the structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 而不是最常见的方法调用此构造函数来实例化对象和启动任务是通过调用静态和方法。Rather than calling this constructor, the most common way to instantiate a object and launch a task is by calling the static and methods. 此构造函数提供的唯一好处是它允许对象实例化，以从任务调用分隔。The only advantage offered by this constructor is that it allows object instantiation to be separated from task invocation. ## Examples 下面的示例计算表示出版的书籍的文本文件中单词的大致数目。The following example counts the approximate number of words in text files that represent published books. 每个任务负责打开的文件，以异步方式读取其整个内容并使用正则表达式计算字数统计。Each task is responsible for opening a file, reading its entire contents asynchronously, and calculating the word count by using a regular expression. 调用方法来确保每本书的单词计数显示到控制台之前已完成所有任务。The method is called to ensure that all tasks have completed before displaying the word count of each book to the console. 在此示例中的对象执行与分隔开来对象实例化，以便该示例可以确保每个文件存在。Object instantiation is separated from object execution in this example so that the example can ensure that each file exists. 如果不匹配，将会显示缺少的文件的名称。If they do not, it displays the name of the missing file. 否则，它会调用方法来启动每个任务。Otherwise, it calls the method to launch each task. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.ctor#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.ctor/cs/run3.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.ctor#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.ctor/vb/run3.vb#2)] 正则表达式模式`\p{P}*\s+`匹配零个、 一个或多个标点字符后跟一个或多个空白字符。The regular expression pattern `\p{P}*\s+` matches zero, one, or more punctuation characters followed by one or more white-space characters. 它假定的匹配项的总数等于近似字数统计。It assumes that the total number of matches equals the approximate word count.

span.span: Creates a continuation that executes asynchronously when the target task completes.
A new continuation task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回将才会按计划执行当前任务完成之前，无论是由于成功运行到完成、 出错由于未经处理的异常，或由于被取消提前退出。The returned will not be scheduled for execution until the current task has completed, whether it completes due to running to completion successfully, faulting due to an unhandled exception, or exiting early due to being canceled. ## Examples 以下示例创建一个使用埃拉托色的埃拉托色尼斯来计算 1 与用户输入的值之间的素数的先行任务。The following example creates an antecedent task that uses the Sieve of Eratosthenes to calculate the prime numbers between 1 and a value entered by the user. 一个数组，用于保存有关质数的信息。An array is used to hold information about the prime numbers. 数组索引表示数字，而元素的值则表示该数字是复合 (其值是`true`) 或素数 (其值是`false`)。The array index represents the number, and the element's value indicates whether that number is composite (its value is `true`) or prime (its value is `false`). 此任务然后传递到延续任务，它负责从整数数组提取质数，并显示它们。This task is then passed to a continuation task, which is responsible for extracting the prime numbers from the integer array and displaying them. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1.ContinueWith#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1.continuewith/cs/continue2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1.ContinueWith#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1.continuewith/vb/continue2.vb#2)]

summary.span: 创建一个传递有状态信息并在目标 完成时执行的延续。

span.span: Creates a continuation that is passed state information and that executes when the target completes.
A new continuation .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回将才会按计划执行当前任务完成之前，无论是由于成功运行到完成、 出错由于未经处理的异常，或提前退出由于被取消的原因。The returned will not be scheduled for execution until the current task has completed, whether it completes due to running to completion successfully, faulting due to an unhandled exception, or exiting out early due to being canceled. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个任务，介于 2 和 20 之间传递一个整数并返回一个数组，包含前 10 个指数 (从 n1到 n10) 的该数字。The following example creates a task that is passed an integer between 2 and 20 and returns an array that contains the first ten exponents (from n1 to n10) of that number. 然后，延续任务负责显示指数的后面。A continuation task is then responsible for displaying the exponents. 在前面的任务和原始数字前面的任务生成其指数传递此消息。It is passed both the antecedent and the original number whose exponents the antecedent generates. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1.ContinueWith#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1.continuewith/cs/continuewith3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1.ContinueWith#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1.continuewith/vb/continuewith3.vb#3)]

span.span: Creates a cancelable continuation that executes asynchronously when the target completes.
A new continuation task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回将才会按计划执行当前任务完成之前，无论是由于成功运行到完成、 出错由于未经处理的异常，或提前退出由于被取消的原因。The returned will not be scheduled for execution until the current task has completed, whether it completes due to running to completion successfully, faulting due to an unhandled exception, or exiting out early due to being canceled. ## Examples 以下示例创建一个使用埃拉托色的埃拉托色尼斯来计算 1 与用户输入的值之间的素数的先行任务。The following example creates an antecedent task that uses the Sieve of Eratosthenes to calculate the prime numbers between 1 and a value entered by the user. 一个数组，用于保存有关质数的信息。An array is used to hold information about the prime numbers. 数组索引表示数字，而元素的值则表示该数字是复合 (其值是`true`) 或素数 (其值是`false`)。The array index represents the number, and the element's value indicates whether that number is composite (its value is `true`) or prime (its value is `false`). 此任务然后传递到延续任务，它负责从整数数组提取质数，并显示它们。This task is then passed to a continuation task, which is responsible for extracting the prime numbers from the integer array and displaying them. 取消标记传递给前面的任务和延续任务。A cancellation token is passed to both the antecedent and the continuation task. 一个对象用于定义的超时值为 100 毫秒。A object is used to define a timeout value of 100 milliseconds. 触发事件时，如果调用方法，并取消标记用于请求取消的任务。If the event fires, the method is called, and the cancellation token is used to request cancellation of the tasks. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1.ContinueWith#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1.continuewith/cs/continue1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1.ContinueWith#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1.continuewith/vb/continue1.vb#1)] 通常情况下，提供约为 100,000 值会导致超时间隔过期和事件触发，并取消请求设置。Typically, supplying a value of about 100,000 causes the timeout interval to expire and the event to fire, and the cancellation request to be set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回将才会按计划执行当前任务完成之前，无论是由于成功运行到完成、 出错由于未经处理的异常，或提前退出由于被取消的原因。The returned will not be scheduled for execution until the current task has completed, whether it completes due to running to completion successfully, faulting due to an unhandled exception, or exiting out early due to being canceled. ## Examples 以下示例创建延续任务的链。The following example creates a chain of continuation tasks. 每个任务提供当前时间对象的状态参数方法。Each task provides the current time, a object, for the state argument of the method. 每个值表示在其中创建继续任务的时间。Each value represents the time at which the continue task is created. 每个任务都将生成作为其第二个结果值，该值表示任务的完成的时间。Each task produces as its result a second value that represents the time at which the task finishes. 所有任务都完成后，该示例将显示每个延续任务的开始和完成的日期和时间。After all tasks finish, the example displays the date and times at which each continuation task starts and finishes. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的默认实例类为通过调用无参数创建完全相同的构造函数。This property returns a default instance of the class that is identical to the one created by calling the parameterless constructor. 它具有以下属性值：It has the following property values: |PropertyProperty|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||| ||| ||| ||`null`或 `null`, or | 此属性的最常见用途是创建并启动新任务对单个调用中方法。The most common use of this property is to create and start a new task in a single call to the method. > [!NOTE] > 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，则方法提供了最简单的方式来创建默认配置值的对象。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the method provides the easiest way to create a object with default configuration values. 下面的示例使用静态属性以使对三个调用方法。The following example uses the static property to make three calls to the method. 首次启动`Task`对象，该执行返回 1 的 lambda 表达式对象。The first starts a `Task` object, which executes a lambda expression that returns 1. 第二个启动`Task`对象，该执行实例化新的 lambda 表达式对象`Test`实例。The second starts a `Task` object, which executes a lambda expression that instantiates a new `Test` instance. 第三个启动`Task`对象，该枚举 C:\Users\Public\Pictures\Sample Pictures\ 目录中的文件对象。The third starts a `Task` object, which enumerates the files in the C:\Users\Public\Pictures\Sample Pictures\ directory. （请注意，该示例成功执行需要该目录存在并且它包含文件。(Note that successful execution of the example requires that the directory exist and that it contain files. span.span: The result value of this , which is of the same type as the task's type parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 访问属性 get 访问器阻止调用线程，直到异步操作已完成;它相当于调用方法。Accessing the property's get accessor blocks the calling thread until the asynchronous operation is complete; it is equivalent to calling the method. 可用操作的结果后，它存储，并在随后调用立即返回属性。Once the result of an operation is available, it is stored and is returned immediately on subsequent calls to the property. 请注意，如果该任务，在操作期间发生异常或已取消该任务，属性不返回值。Note that, if an exception occurred during the operation of the task, or if the task has been cancelled, the property does not return a value. 相反，尝试访问的属性值都将引发异常。Instead, attempting to access the property value throws an exception. ## Examples 下面的示例是一个命令行实用工具，计算每个目录作为命令行参数传递其名称中的文件中的字节数。The following example is a command-line utility that calculates the number of bytes in the files in each directory whose name is passed as a command-line argument. 如果该目录包含文件，它将执行实例化的 lambda 表达式对象的每个文件的目录中检索的值和其属性。If the directory contains files, it executes a lambda expression that instantiates a object for each file in the directory and retrieves the value of its property. 如果目录不包含的任何文件，它只需调用方法创建任务的属性为零 (0)。If a directory contains no files, it simply calls the method to create a task whose property is zero (0). 当任务完成时，是可从目录中的所有文件中的字节总数属性。When the tasks finish, the total number of bytes in all a directory's files is available from the property.
